system.appearance: Transparent people or beings with sharp looking claws and hollow, empty-looking eyes like voids.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Battle Cry Aura]{Battle Cry Aura} and @L[Ability:Battle Cry Resistance]{Battle Cry Resistance}.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the targets' @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.
You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

overview.proficient: You instead fly at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed}.

overview.base: You count as being @L[Keyword:Undead]{undead} for the purposes of @L[Category:Abilities]{abilities}, @L[Category:Damage types]{damage}, and other @L[Category:Effects]{effects}. You also gain @L[Ability:Ethereal Senses]{Ethereal Senses}, @L[Ability:Healing Sensitivity]{Healing Sensitivity}, @L[Ability:Impure Durability]{Impure Durability}, @L[Ability:Mana Drain Grasp]{Mana Drain Grasp}, @L[Ability:Undead Mind]{Undead Mind}, and @L[Ability:Undying Durability]{Undying Durability}.
You can see and hear spirits and @L[Condition:Ethereal]{Ethereal} creatures.

@L[Core:Healing]{Healing} can be used to @L[Core:Damage]{damage} you. If the creature providing you @L[Core:Healing]{healing} specifies that they are doing so "for damage" then you roll your largest @L[Core:HP]{hit die} and take that much @L[Damage:Holy]{holy damage} instead of the normal @L[Core:Healing]{healing} effect. This does not consume any of your @L[Core:HP]{hit dice}.

results.hit: Deal [[/drain 1d8[mana]]] @L[Category:Drain types]{drain} to the target. If this @L[Condition:Dead]{kills} the target, you @L[Core:Revitalizing]{revitalize}.
results.critHit: Deal [[/drain 2d8[mana]]] @L[Category:Drain types]{drain} to the target. If this @L[Condition:Dead]{kills} the target, you @L[Core:Revitalizing]{revitalize} twice.

overview.base: You are @L[Keyword:Immunity]{immune} to being @L[Condition:Frightened]{frightened} or @L[Condition:Charmed]{charmed}. The effects of Undead Mind are maintained even if @L[Condition:Transformed]{transformed}.

You are @L[Keyword:Immunity]{immune} to @L[Condition:Unconscious]{unconsciousness}, @L[Condition:Suffocating]{suffocating}, and being @L[Condition:Poisoned]{poisoned}. You do not @L[Condition:Down]{drop} due to being at negative @L[Core:HP]{HP}. You still @L[Condition:Dead]{die} when you reach half your maximum @L[Core:HP]{HP} below zero. You also do not have to @L[Core:Drowning]{breathe}.

You cannot wear @L[Category:Armor]{armor} and you may pass through non-@L[Property:Silver]{silver} walls while @L[Condition:Ethereal]{Ethereal}. You are also @L[Keyword:Immunity]{immune} to being @L[Condition:Snared]{snared}.
You go @L[Condition:Ethereal]{Ethereal} or manifest back into the Material Realm.
You gain @L[Ability:Offensive Martial Arts]{Offensive Martial Arts} and @L[Ability:Defensive Martial Arts]{Defensive Martial Arts}.

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Shields]{shields} for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Block Interaction]{block} with them and their @L[Core:Block Value]{BV} is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands @L[Property:Blocking]{blocking}.

results.critHit: The target automatically fails the first [[/roll 2d4]] roll.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, deal an additional [[/damage 1d4[magic ice]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage} as well.
system.endCondition: At the end of each of the target's actions, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: Target takes an additional [[/damage 5[lethal]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage}. This also has all @L[Category:Damage types]{damage types} of the triggering @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack}. If the triggering @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack} was a critical hit, this deals 10 @L[Core:Damage]{damage} instead.

system.trigger: You have just hit a creature with an @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack} that dealt them @L[Core:Damage]{damage} from it.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Offensive Martial Arts]{Offensive Martial Arts} and become @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluent} in it. Additionally, your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} are @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}. If you have @L[Ability:Hind Claws]{Hind Claws}, you become @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluent} in it as well and your @L[Equipment:Foot]{feet} are @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
